title.faq: Caffe Bar Art - Frequently Asked Questions

header.title: Caffe Bar Art
header.tagline: Home of great coffee and even better atmosphere.

home.intro: Caffe Bar Art is easy to find in the center of Žitište village at Trg Oslobođenja - a place where tradition and modern atmosphere perfectly blend. We provide our guests with a unique experience that combines quality, warmth and authenticity. Our garden, surrounded by greenery and the shade of old trees, is a true oasis of peace. Whether you're looking for a morning energy boost with aromatic coffee or a relaxing evening with a refreshing drink, you'll find your corner of enjoyment here.

bar_section.title: Bar
bar_section.text1: Our rich drinks menu will satisfy every taste. From the best domestic and international beers, through premium spirits, to refreshing cocktails and soft drinks.
bar_section.text2: Every drink comes with a carefully selected atmosphere and a pleasant environment where you can enjoy time with friends.

gallery_section.title: Ambiance
gallery_section.text1: Peek into our world through the lens. Our gallery showcases moments of relaxation, great drinks and the unforgettable atmosphere that reigns at Caffe Bar Art.
gallery_section.text2: From morning coffee to evening events, every moment is special and worth remembering.

bar.subtitle: Enjoy our rich selection of beverages

about.title: About Us
about.text: A café that has been successfully operating for many years, owned by the Milinović family. Year after year we grow, expand and provide the residents of Žitište and surrounding areas with a pleasant atmosphere for coffee or evening gatherings.

atmosphere.title: Atmosphere
atmosphere.text: The ambiance in our garden gives a specific taste to our coffee. On Fridays and Saturdays in the evening hours, we turn to faster rhythms, providing the best entertainment in the area.

beers.title: Beers
beers.text: A large selection of beers from the Jelen group will leave no one thirsty. Pay attention to our promotions during sporting events, you'll drink Stella, Staropramen or Bavaria below regular price.

wines.title: Wines
wines.text: Bajilo wines from Sremski Karlovci offer a rich selection of white, red and rosé varieties. From fresh Sauvignon and aromatic Tamjanika to full-bodied Cabernet Sauvignon - we have the right wine for every taste.

coffee.title: Coffee
coffee.text: Our Lavazza gran espresso coffee, with its specific taste, will give you an extra burst of energy to overcome any obstacle that has befallen you that day.

about.description: Home of great coffee and even better atmosphere in the center of Žitište. Join us for an unforgettable experience.

cookie_consent.title: Cookies & Privacy
cookie_consent.message: We use Google Analytics cookies to understand how visitors use our site and improve your experience. Your data is anonymous and secure.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Here you can find answers to the most common questions about Caffe Bar Art Žitište

location.question: Where is Caffe Bar Art located?
location.answer: Caffe Bar Art is located in the center of Žitište at Trg Oslobođenja bb. You can easily find us in the main part of the village, at the main square.

hours.question: What are the café's opening hours?

garden.question: Do you have a garden?
garden.answer: Yes! We have a beautiful garden surrounded by greenery and the shade of old trees, which is a true oasis of peace in the center of Žitište. Our garden is perfect for relaxing with morning coffee or evening gatherings.

coffee.question: What coffee do you offer?
coffee.answer: We offer premium Lavazza gran espresso coffee which is characterized by its specific taste and excellent quality. Our coffee will give you a real boost of energy.

events.question: Do you organize live music and entertainment?
events.answer: Yes! On Fridays and Saturdays in the evening hours, we turn to faster rhythms and organize entertainment with live music, providing the best fun in the Žitište area.

parking.question: Do you have parking?
parking.answer: Our café has its own parking space exclusively for our guests. The parking is located right next to the venue, so you can enjoy without worrying about a place for your car.

cards.question: Do you accept cards?
cards.answer: Yes, we accept credit cards as well as cash. We accept all standard credit and debit cards.

wifi.question: Do you have WiFi?
wifi.answer: Yes, we offer free WiFi access to all our guests.

distance.question: How far are you from Zrenjanin?
distance.answer: Žitište is located about 15 km from Zrenjanin, which is approximately 15-20 minutes by car. We are the closest quality café with a relaxing garden in this area.

menu.question: What can we order from you?
menu.answer: We have a rich selection of drinks:
menu.beers_desc: Wide selection from Jelen group (Stella, Staropramen, Bavaria)
menu.wines_desc: Bajilo wines - Sauvignon, Tamjanika, Cabernet Sauvignon, Rosé and other varieties
